title: Please Don't Go
description: On her very first day in Brittany, fifteen year-old Mary finds herself swept into French sea-side life. She falls for a handsome man, she meets a boy who'll change her life, and she hears a haunting song she will never forget - Ne me Quitte Pas - Please don't leave me. A beach romance for teenage girls - a story to break your heart.
author: Peggy Woodford
